title: #198: The Crash with Max Keiser
description:
Thank you for tuning for another episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This episode we welcome World Financial Expert Max Keiser to discuss the upcoming financial collapse that is on our horizon, how we got to this point and what you should do to survive it. All of this and more on this awesome episode of Tin Foli Hat!
